name: Toy Tap Blast
description:
Once you've blasted all elements, you can move up to the next level and win more gifts and rewards!
Challenge your mind and solve the puzzles. It's easy and super exciting! Become a puzzle master level
by level. Train your brain by playing with speed—the faster the better!

How to Play
- Easy and fun to play!
- Touch more than 2 blocks with the same color!
- Tap color bomb to Blast explode around cubes!
- Tap on 5 more blocks to generate a new blossom which has a special skill!

Game Features
- Various rewards.
- Beautiful graphics and animation.
- Simple operation & excitement challenges..
- Awesome time killer game.
